description:
The North Star`s leader must be eliminated... But Lin was once saved a long time ago. Feeling chagrin at this twist of fate, Falco is ready to eliminate Lin regardless. Witnessing this, the criminal Harn brothers urge the boy guarding them to break the concrete holding them imprisoned. They turn out to be successors to one of the 108 styles of the South Star that Falco slaughtered, the South Star Twin Hawk Fist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`âme du Nanto brûle. La mort héroïque des frères Harn
Nanto no Tamashii Moyu! Souzetsu HaRn Kyoudai!
The Wrath of the South Star! The Illustrious Harn Brothers!
南斗の魂燃ゆ! 壮絶ハーン兄弟!
